news.title: Former Googlers seek to captivate kids with an AI-powered learning app

news.title: Microsoft handed the government encryption keys for customer data

news.summary: Federal agents in Minneapolis repeatedly punched a man, forced him to the ground, and then shot him multiple times. The man was later pronounced dead. news.title: No One Is Quite Sure Why Ice Is Slippery
